welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Watervliet, where small-town charm meets bustling city life. Known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albany International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A offers gates for domestic flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves international flights and is home to customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schenectady County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Schenectady County Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
